btc.ins: BTC币种: 注意如果抽水到<font color="#11FF00">viabtc矿池</font>那么请将抽水时的密码选项设置为<font color="#11FF00">d=65536</font>用来修改启始难度提升抽水的转换率否则抽水转换率可能会变低

zil.ins: ZIL币种: 注意RIG内核一定要选择<font color="#11FF00">statum+tcp://协议</font>,不能选择<font color="#FF0000">zmp+tcp://协议</font>

kaspa.ins: KASPA币种: 抽水不要抽到鱼池，一定要抽到鱼池的话必须指定固定难度，通过密码的方式具体查看鱼池官网说明,或者使用鱼池KAS芯片机挖矿地址比如:<font color="#11FF00">stratum+tcp://kas-asia.f2pool.com:1430</font>

zil_k1_pool.ins: ZIL_K1币种: 抽水地址必须是K1矿池的地址否则可能无法抽水或矿机无法正常工作

btc.ins: BTC Currency: Note If fee to <font color="#11FF00">viabtc mining pool </font> then set the password option when fee to <font color="#11FF00">d=65536</font> Used to modify the starting difficulty to increase the fee conversion rate. Otherwise, the fee conversion rate may be low

zil.ins: ZIL: Note that the RIG kernel must select <font color="#11FF00">statum+tcp:// protocol </font>, not <font color="#FF0000">zmp+tcp:// protocol </font>

kaspa.ins: KASPA currency: Do not fee to the f2 pool, must be fee to the f2 pool must specify a fixed difficulty, through the way of password to see the specific description of the f2 pool official website

zil_k1_pool.ins: ZIL_K1 currency: The fee address must be the address of the K1 mining pool otherwise the fee may not be possible or the miner will not work properly
